title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct answer t= 2π   MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BFB@ only

1 point is earned for the justification

v(t)=0  when   t 2 2 =π t= 2π   or  2.506 or 2.507 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5D1A@

Since v(t)<0 for 0<t< 2π  and v(t)>0 for  2π <t<3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5950@ , the particle changes directions at t = 2 π .

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the ± distance that the particle travels while velocity is negative

∫ 0 2π v(t)dt =−3.265 x( 2π )=x(0)+ ∫ 0 2π v(t)dt =−2.265 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@6100@

1 point is earned for the correct answer

Since the total distance from t = 0 to t = 3 is 4.334, the particle is still to the left of the origin at

t = 3. Hence the greatest distance from the origin is 2.265.
